        public static Transition[] getTransitionFrom(int n,
                             Transition[] tr)
        Returns all the transitions starting from a state n

        tr - the array of transitions
        Returns:

      • getTransitionByLabel

        public static Transition[] getTransitionByLabel(int l,
                                Transition[] tr)
        Return all the transitions with label l
        Parameters:
        l - the label
        tr - an array of transitions
        Returns:
        the transitions of tr with the label equals to l
